Package board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
board.Board
public class Board extends Object
Chessboard with an 8x8 grid of pieces plus basic move/capture logic.

  • Method Details

    • setupClassic

      public void setupClassic()
      Initializes the classic starting position.

    • getPiece

      public Piece getPiece(Position position)
      Returns the piece at the given position (or null if empty/out of bounds).
      Parameters:
      position - board coordinate
      Returns:
      piece or null

    • movePiece

      public boolean movePiece(Position from, Position to)
      Attempts to move a piece from from to to. Validates via the piece's isValidMove, blocks self-capture, captures opponents, and updates positions.
      Parameters:
      from - start square
      to - destination square
      Returns:
      true if the move was executed; false if illegal/blocked

    • isCheck

      public boolean isCheck(Board.Color color)
      Returns:
      true if the given side is in check (not implemented yet).

    • isCheckmate

      public boolean isCheckmate(Board.Color color)
      Returns:
      true if the given side is checkmated (not implemented yet).

    • display

      public void display()
      Prints the board with files A–H and ranks 8–1.
